channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Shell
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Shell

item.title: CVE-2018-0883|2024-08-05T03:44:10.964Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20shell
item.description: Windows Shell in Microsoft Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 and RT 8.1, Windows Server 2012 and R2, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703, Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server, version 1709 allows a remote code execution vulnerability due to how file copy destinations are validated, aka "Windows Shell Remote Code Execution Vulnerability".
